reference.text: preserving A23B; obtaining protein compositions for foodstuffs A23J1/00; fish, meat or poultry preparations A23L; disintegrating, e.g. chopping meat, B02C18/00; preparation of proteins C07K1/00

note.note-paragraph: In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

title-part.text: Apparatus for mixing meat, sausage-meat, or meat products
Apparatus for pounding, forming, or pressing meat, sausage-meat, or meat products

reference.text: meat patty moulding devices for domestic use A47J43/20; ham boilers A47J27/20

CPC-specific-text.text: specially adapted for making multi-layered meat products
Containers in which meat is pressed and moulded
Containers for moulding and pressing ham
Pressing and moulding by means of a drum
with worms or other rotary mounted members

title-part.text: Apparatus for tenderising meat, e.g. ham

CPC-specific-text.text: Tumblers and rotating drums for massaging meat in their interior
; Apparatus for handling or conveying sausage products during manufacture
Machines for making skinless sausages, e.g. Frankfurters, Wieners
Removing casings from sausages during manufacture
Apparatus for binding or tying sausages or meat, e.g. salami, rollades; Filling sausage products into sleeve netting

reference.text: enclosing material in preformed tubular webs B65B9/10

CPC-specific-text.text: with multiple interchangeable stuffing horns, e.g. magazine arrangements
Supplying casings to the stuffing device
for sausages having at least one flat end

title-part.text: with piston operated by liquid or gaseous means
with pressing-worm or other rotary-mounted pressing-members

reference.text: subdividing filled flexible tubes to form packages, involving displacement of contents B65B9/12, by applying pressure and heat successively B65B51/26

CPC-specific-text.text: by means of shear or blade elements
The sheer or blade elements being displaceable parallel to the sausage string in order to create a narrow point free of meat
A string passing between two rotary members comprising dividing elements cooperating with each other
with dividing elements located on the surface of a single rotary member

reference.text: applying clips or binding material to package folds or closures, e.g. to twisted bag necks B65B51/04, B65B51/08

CPC-specific-text.text: Apparatus for making sausage casings, e.g. simultaneously with stuffing artificial casings

reference.text: enclosing material webs being formed into tubes in situ around filling nozzles B65B9/20

CPC-specific-text.text: Apparatus for making artificial collagen casings
Chemical composition of synthetic sausage casings
coextruded together with the food product
with peeling aids, e.g. reducing adhesion between casing and product
with at least one layer of a fat impermeable material
with features allowing an easy opening and/or removal of the casing
with at least one layer of a gas, e.g. oxygen, water vapour, impermeable material
with at least one layer of a water impermeable material
suitable for impregnation with flavouring substances, e.g. caramel, liquid smoke, spices
nets and similar open structures to hold sausages and meat in general

reference.text: making nets D04G; filling sausage products into sleeve netting A22C11/005

CPC-specific-text.text: thermoplastic casings, casings with at least one layer of thermoplastic material
casings according to the presence or absence of seams
seamed casings, casings with at least one longitudinal seam
seamless casings made out of a continuous seamless tubular sheet
treated in order to be conferred a rough appearance
printable sausage casings or sausage casings showing any kind of indicia
smokable casings, e.g. permeable to liquid smoke or phenol
textile casings, casings with at least one layer of textile material

reference.text: storing preformed tubular webs on filling nozzles B65B9/15

CPC-specific-text.text: Holders or packs of shirred casings

title-part.text: Apparatus for hanging-up meat or sausages

reference.text: filling and conveying sausage products during manufacture A22C11/00; transport through slaughterhouses A22B7/001; poultry shackles A22C21/0007; conveying poultry A22C21/0053

CPC-specific-text.text: Specially adapted for hanging or conveying several sausages or strips of meat
Loops, hooks, cords for suspending single sausages; apparatus for making or conveying loops for sausages
Hooks or the like specially adapted for meat or hams or part of carcasses
Hangers with more hooks penetrating the piece of meat
Apparatus for inserting a cord into a piece of meat
Racks for storing or smoking suspended meat or sausages
Cages specially adapted for suspending hams, meat or sausages

title-part.text: Other devices for processing meat or bones

CPC-specific-text.text: Boards or blocks for cutting or chopping meat
Producing portions of meat with predetermined characteristics, e.g. weight or particular dimensions
Cutting slices out of a piece of meat

reference.text: deboning poultry A22C21/0069; deboning operations on carcasses A22B5/0035

CPC-specific-text.text: specially adapted for meat containing ribs
using visual recognition, X-rays, ultrasounds, or other contactless means to determine quality or size of portioned meat
for measuring quality, e.g. to determine further processing
Calculating cutting patterns based on visual recognition
Handling, transporting or packaging pieces of meat

title-part.text: Apparatus for holding meat or bones while cutting

reference.text: holding fish A22C25/06; holding meat for carving A47J43/18

title-part.text: Cleaning, e.g. washing, meat or sausages

CPC-specific-text.text: ; Treatment thereof for the manufacture of natural sausage casings

reference.text: making artificial casings A22C13/0003; chemical treatment of natural casings A22C13/0026

title-part.text: Machines for pulling intestines to pieces
Machines for removing fat or slime from intestines

reference.text: cleaning the stomach of slaughtered animals A22B5/18

title-part.text: Plants, factories, or the like for processing meat

reference.text: for processing poultry only A22C21/00; for processing fish only A22C25/00

CPC-specific-text.text: Killing poultry entering the processing machine
Filleting poultry, i.e. extracting, cutting or shaping poultry fillets
Transferring or conveying devices for poultry
Deboning poultry or parts of poultry
Skinning poultry or parts of poultry

title-part.text: Scalding, singeing, waxing, or dewaxing poultry

CPC-specific-text.text: Extracting or removing the tendons from the legs of poultry
; Curing of fish; Stunning of fish by electric current; Investigating fish by optical means
Devices for washing or descaling fish by hand

title-part.text: Separating ice from fish packed in ice
Fish-holding and auxiliary devices in connection with work-tables
Holding, guiding, or conveying fish before, during or after its preparation

CPC-specific-text.text: ; Devices for sizing fish; Automatically adapting conveyors or processing machines to the measured size

title-part.text: Devices for threading fish on strings or the like
Arranging fish, e.g. according to the position of head and tail

reference.text: combined with removing fish-bone, skinning and filleting A22C25/14; hand tools A22C25/006

CPC-specific-text.text: Eviscerating by means of vacuum or suction devices

reference.text: combined with beheading, eviscerating A22C25/14; hand tools A22C25/006

CPC-specific-text.text: Removing loose pin bones, e.g. from fish fillets
Devices therefor, e.g. claw locks, claw crushers, grading devices; Processing lines
Grading or classifying shellfish or bivalves

title-part.text: Processing shrimps, lobsters or the like

CPC-specific-text.text: ; Methods or machines for the shelling of shellfish
Cleaning operations on shellfish, e.g. evisceration, brushing
Mechanically opening and shelling crabs, lobsters or other hard-shelled crustaceans
Mechanically peeling and shelling shrimps, prawns or other soft-shelled crustaceans
Cleaning operations on bivalves, e.g. evisceration, brushing, separation of meat and shell material
